p.k: Comedy, Art Japan (1986). Hrají: Nobuko Miyamoto, Tsutomu Yamakazi, Ken Watanabe, Rikiya Yasuoka. Režie: Itami Juzo.
p.d: A truck driver stops at a small family-run noodle shop and decides to help its fledgling business. The story is intertwined with various vignettes about the relationship of love and food
